site_name: Old Deer Park, Mid Surrey Bowls Club
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Purple Norway maple (Acer platanoides 'Schwerinii')Rear of number 31Suggested works are to, 2.5m crown reduction in width and 2.5m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 10m and height of 12mT2 - Hornbeam (Caprinus Betulis)Rear of numbers 31 and 33Suggested works are to, 2.5m crown reduction in width and 2.5m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 8m and height of 10mT3 - Purple Norway maple (Acer platanoides 'Schwerinii')Rear of numbers 33 and 35Suggested works are to, 2.5m crown reduction in width and 2.5m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 10m and height of 14mT4 - Cappadocian Maple (Acer cappadocicum)Rear of number 35Suggested works are to, 2.5m crown reduction in width and 2.5m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 7m and height of 10mT5 - Purple Norway maple (Acer platanoides 'Schwerinii')Rear of number 37Suggested works are to, 2.5m crown reduction in width and 2.5m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 10m and height of 14m
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
